fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a dead player each night. They will now be able to talk in the day chat, use their abilities and like vote.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Ghosts gain another ability, allowing them to encourage and support you at night. If used, the following night, you can use your ability twice. This can stack, and can be multitasked!

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have there be more ghost frens than inanimate corpses (have the majority of dead people be ghosts by the end of the game).
